price: Yeye anakuamrisheni maovu na machafu, na mumsingizie Mwenyezi Mungu mambo msiyo yajua.
arabic: إِنَّمَا يَأۡمُرُكُم بِٱلسُّوٓءِ وَٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِ وَأَن تَقُولُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: Shetani anakupambieni kiovu kwa dhati na chenye madhara kwa afya yenu, na kibaya ili mkitende. Kwa sababu yake mnafuata dhana na mawazo yasio na msingi. Mkamsingizia Mwenyezi Mungu kuhalalisha na kuharimisha bila ya dalili ya ilimu na yakini.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innamā yamurukum bil-sūi wal-faḥshāi wa-an taqūlū ʿalā al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
